Uses of Class
script.Bloc

Packages that use Bloc
script   
 

Uses of Bloc in script
 

Subclasses of Bloc in script
 class ConditionalBloc
          Conditional bloc is the base abstract class for if and do blocs.
 class DoBloc
          This class is the DO control structure.
 class Function
           
 class IfBloc
          This class is the If control structure.
 

Methods in script that return Bloc
 Bloc IfBloc.getEndBloc()
          Helper method to find the end bloc of an if bloc
 Bloc DoBloc.getEndBloc()
          Helper method to find the end bloc of a do bloc
 Bloc Script.getFirstFinalizeBloc()
          This method returns the first bloc in the finalize phase
 Bloc Script.getFirstInitializeBloc()
          This method returns the first bloc in the initialize phase
 Bloc Script.getFirstLoopBloc()
          This method returns the first bloc in the loop
 Bloc Bloc.getNextBloc()
          This method returns the next bloc in the flow.
 Bloc[] Bloc.getNextBlocs()
           
 Bloc IfBloc.getNextFalseBranchBloc()
          This method returns the next false branch bloc.
 Bloc IfBloc.getNextTrueBranchBloc()
          This method returns the next true branch bloc.
 

Methods in script that return types with arguments of type Bloc

 java.util.List<Bloc> Script.getInitializeBlocs()
           
 java.util.List<Bloc> Script.getLoopBlocs()
           
 java.util.List<Bloc> Bloc.getPreviousBlocs()
           
 

Methods in script with parameters of type Bloc
 void Script.addBlocsConnection(Bloc sourceBloc, Bloc targetBloc)
          Helper method which add a connection between two blocs
 void Script.addFinalizeBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method adds a bloc to the finalize phase
 void Script.addInitializeBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method adds a bloc to the initialize phase
 void Script.addLoopBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method adds a bloc to the loop
 void Bloc.addPreviousBloc(Bloc bloc, boolean isLastBlocInDoBloc)
          This method adds a bloc as previous bloc of this bloc. if the bloc to add is the last bloc of a do bloc loop, second parameter must be set to true, which means that the current bloc is a do bloc.
 void Script.removeBlocsConnection(Bloc sourceBloc, Bloc targetBloc)
          Helper method which delete a connection between two blocs
 void Script.removeFinalizeBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method removes a bloc from the finalize phase
 void Script.removeInitializeBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method removes a bloc from the initialize phase
 void Script.removeLoopBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method removes a bloc from the loop
 void Bloc.removeNextBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method removes a bloc from one of the two next blocs of this bloc.
 void Bloc.removePreviousBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method removes a bloc from all the previous blocs of this bloc.
 void Bloc.setNextBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method sets one of the two next bloc of this bloc to the bloc parameter.
 void IfBloc.setNextFalseBranchBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method sets the next bloc of this bloc in the false branch.
 void IfBloc.setNextTrueBranchBloc(Bloc bloc)
          This method sets the next bloc of this bloc in the true branch.
